Service.Name: OGC:WMS
Service.Title: Smart Emission Web Map Service
Service.Abstract: A compliant implementation of WMS plus most of the SLD extension (dynamic styling). Can also generate PDF, SVG, KML, GeoRSS

Layer.Title: Smart Emission Web Map Service
Layer.Abstract: A compliant implementation of WMS plus most of the SLD extension (dynamic styling). Can also generate PDF, SVG, KML, GeoRSS
